title: Gaming monitor question
body: Hey guys quick question. I am saving up for a pc build that is going to cost around $3500 and for the gaming monitor, I want a 144Hz refresh rate followed by an IPS display and with 4k resolution. Are there any monitors with such specs or am I just dreaming and have to wait for it? üòÇ

replies.body:
Honestly that just reminds me of the Scorpio announcement from windows, dumbasses think they can run 4k on an xbox.

I'm certain there are monitors that can run it, your gonna run into 2 main problems though (with a third league related problem).

1. Running it at that Frame rate from your PC, you have to have a really high end graphics card for that.
2. Running a game at that high a resolution, your likely going to have to offset it by actually lowering the quality (i'm not fully up to date, but 3.5k i don't think can run games on high settings and at 4k, that said, you could easily just go ahead and run it at like 1920 x 1080 quite well, and honestly it's not that major of a difference)
(3. and this is league related, League has the problem where running the game at 4k will actually cause the UI to be massively tiny, and i don't think this was ever fixed, so be aware of that)

So few things i have found out in regards to the Graphics card, it should run most games at 4k fairly well, however if you go max settings, don't be surprised if your only getting 30ish FPS (during the most big parts of the game).

As for monitors, i haven't found a specific monitor, but i have found out that there are a few... problems surrounding some monitors (such as monitors being 2 mini monitors tiled together) this can cause a few problems, though might not with your setup, just be wary of this fact.

That said as far as i can tell, there are no 4k monitors that run above 60hz as it is a massive haul on the system to do so (for fairly obvious reasons)

My personal suggestion would be monitor wise it may be worth going for 1 4k monitor, and 1 lower quality monitor that has higher hz if that is what your mainly wanting.
